original_title: The Electric Cord Strangler 2: I Strangle the Body Electric
overview: Shattered by the brutal death of his best "go-girls," a local drug kingpin recruits some fresh meat to do his bidding unaware that the Electric Cord Strangler has returned and is eager to squeeze and throttle tender female throats.
title: The Electric Cord Strangler 2: I Strangle the Body Electric
